# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_NO_EXPLOSION_DAMAGE_FROM_DRIVER

## Summary
Don't allow vehicle to take explosion damage from explosions generated by owner

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** noDamage
